scripts.pre-release: npm run build; git add . -A; git commit -m 'pre-release commit'
scripts.release-prerelease: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version prerelease --preid beta; npm run release;
scripts.release-patch: npm run pre-release && npm version patch -m "%s" && npm run release;
scripts.release-patch-beta: npm run pre-release && npm version patch -m "%s" --preid beta && npm run release;
scripts.release-minor: npm run pre-release && npm version minor -m "%s" && npm run release;
scripts.release-minor-beta: npm run pre-release && npm version minor -m "%s" --preid beta && npm run release;
scripts.release-major: npm run pre-release && npm version major -m "%s" && npm run release;
scripts.release-major-beta: npm run pre-release && npm version major -m "%s" --preid beta && npm run release;
scripts.release: git add . -A; git commit; git push --tags origin; npm publish;
